content.text:
[@Mikael Brockman](@oovEFjYs7F5m9RBPiK+gLtKDGL532sTStjiCLyJjqz0=.ed25519) 

I don't think I've tried those, but in the past I've found that I *must* have a gusseted crotch or it'll blow out within months. I've lost dozens of pairs of [otherwise perfect] jeans where the crotch seam is the first to go. Maddening, maybe I'm wearing them wrong? I'll need to try out suspenders someday as well, those make way more sense to me than just cinching a belt down over my waist.
